name: Golden Idol of Xenopolis
description:
! The game currently appears not to be loading on Firefox, so we suggest for now to use a different browser (verified to work on Chrome, Edge, Opera) !

Experience of piecing together hand-crafted mysteries

If you enjoy being a detective and piecing together clues to reconstruct the events, then you should definitely give Golden Idol of Xenopolis a try.

This demo version currently contains two chapters which offer an introductory and a more challenging experience.

In the era where procedurally generated content is becoming more prominent, we have decided to go into the opposite direction and try to offer meticulously hand-crafted mystery experience.

Support the Game

We've set out to create this game at the start of the 2021 and currently our next step is to figure out if this project has potential.

Therefore, if you enjoyed it and want to support the development of the game, you can do the following:

1. Leave a comment about the game and invite others to check it out.

2. Reach out to the developers by writing to andrejs.klavins@gmail.com

3. Sign up for our newsletter.
